level.heading: RECORDS OF INVITATIONS FOR BIDS AND BIDS (ยง 30-2208)

level.text: The Director of Procurement (“Director”) shall retain a file of each IFB issued by the Agency and each abstract or record of bids.
The file for each IFB shall include the following:
The name and address of each prospective bidder on a solicitation mailing list to which the IFB was sent and additional prospective bidders that were sent copies of the IFB upon request;
The name of each publication in which notice of the IFB was published and the date of each publication; and
The date on which the IFB was issued.
